# RentHub - Rental Platform Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern rental platform with Laravel backend + Filament admin and Next.js frontend.

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Project structure created
- [ ] Backend Laravel setup
- [ ] Frontend Next.js setup
- [ ] API integration
- [ ] Deployment configuration
- [ ] Testing and documentation

## Architecture
- Backend: Laravel 11 + Filament 3 + MySQL
- Frontend: Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind
- Authentication: Laravel Sanctum
- Deployment: Vercel (frontend) + Forge (backend)

## Key Features
- Property listings and search
- User authentication and profiles
- Booking system with calendar
- Review and rating system
- Admin dashboard with Filament
- Payment integration ready
- Multi-language support
- Responsive design
